text:
Hello!

For a sheet with data just in column "A" getFirstCellNum() returns 0, 
getLastCellNum() returns 1.
For a sheet with data just in column "B" getFirstCellNum() returns 1, 
getLastCellNum() returns 2.

I can't find a good reason why getLastCellNum() is 1 based.

Greetings from Germany

    Holger
creator: hsapache@online.de
avik@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14910 ***
